title: When does season start?
body: As title says, when does the 2016 season start, thanks!

replies.body: Possibly next Wednesday. Nothing has been confirmed yet though this is just speculation.
is this speculation based on anything?

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZP40QhjP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-07T12:26:29.249+0000)
>
> is this speculation based on anything?

Nope.
hopefully soon, so all the diamonds can go back the their holes
Usually at the end of January.
